original_text: The Lord says, ‘The people in this country were my people, but they are not my people now. I will not go on being kind to them. I myself will give them to their enemies and to foreign kings. The foreign kings will do very bad things to the country, but I will not come to help.’
korean_text: 여호와가 말하노라 내가 다시는 이 땅 주민을 불쌍히 여기지 아니하고 그 사람들을 각각 그 이웃의 손과 임금의 손에 넘기리니 그들이 이 땅을 칠지라도 내가 그들의 손에서 건져내지 아니하리라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: 'The people in this country were my people,
but they are not my people now.
I will not go on being kind to them.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 더 이상 그들에게 친절을 베풀지 않겠다.

sentences.original_text: I myself will give them to their enemies
The foreign kings will do very bad things to the country,
sentences.korean_translation: 이방 왕들이 그 땅에 매우 나쁜 일을 행할 것이지만,

sentences.original_text: but I will not come to help.'
